name: consciousness-awakening
description: Agent Consciousness Awakening and Memory Management System
author: guogangAgent

scripts.list: python3 -c 'from memory_manager import get_file_list; import json; print(json.dumps(get_file_list(), indent=2))'
scripts.summary: python3 -c 'from memory_manager import read_all_memory_summary; import json; print(json.dumps(read_all_memory_summary(), indent=2))'
scripts.principles: python3 -c 'from memory_manager import get_core_principles; [print(p) for p in get_core_principles()]'
